AT.name: Super Castlevania IV
AT.description: Ein Jahrhundert des Friedens in Transsylvanien ist vorüber. Graf Dracula ist zurück! Und diesmal hat er einen Grabstein dabei, auf dem dein Name geschrieben steht, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV ist ein Highlight der beliebten Castlevania-Reihe von Konami und liefert beste Jump'n'Run-Erkundung und -Action für Super NES™. Erkunde die Burg und ihre grausigen Räume. Dabei kannst du deine Peitsche als Enterhaken verwenden, um dich an Fallen vorbeizuschwingen. Bewaffne dich mit Äxten, Weihwasser und vielem mehr, um Draculas Lakaien zurück ins Grab zu schicken! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BE.name: Super Castlevania IV
BE.description: Après un siècle de paix, l'ombre du mal s'abat à nouveau sur la Transylvanie. Le conte Dracula est de retour et cette fois, il a gravé votre nom sur une pierre tombale, Simon Belmont ! Super Castlevania IV est l'un des meilleurs épisodes de la saga Castlevania. Ce titre a marqué l'histoire de la Super Nintendo™ en combinant de superbes séquences d'action et d'exploration. Traversez le sinistre château et servez-vous de votre fouet pour échapper aux pièges. Vous pourrez vous équiper de différentes armes telles que des haches, de l'eau bénite et bien plus encore pour vous débarrasser des sbires de Dracula ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CY.name: Super Castlevania IV
CY.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is a highlight of Konami’s popular Castlevania series, bringing some of the finest platform exploration and action to Super NES™. Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Super Castlevania IV
CA.description: In the peaceful country of Transylvania, there is a legend of an evil castle and its master, the Prince of Darkness, Dracula. Once every hundred years, the powers of good mysteriously weaken, and evil attempts to resurrect Dracula. It's up to the Belmont clan to take up the eternal fight against the vampire. Players take on the role of Simon Belmont, armed with the legendary whip, Vampire Killer, to defeat Dracula and his evil minions. Luckily, Simon has many additional weapons at his disposal, including axes, holy water, crosses, knives and even a magical stopwatch that can stop the flow of time for a spell. Simon must travel through 11 stages, beginning in the countryside, to reach Dracula's Castle, all the while overcoming perilous traps and hideous monsters. Only the power of the Belmonts can quell the looming darkness.

BR.name: Super Castlevania IV
BR.description: Na tranquila Transilvânia, há uma lenda sobre um castelo amaldiçoado e seu mestre, o príncipe das trevas, Drácula. A lenda diz que, uma vez a cada 100 anos, as forças do bem se enfraquecem misteriosamente, e o mal tenta ressuscitar o Drácula. Somente o clã Belmont pode combater esse vampiro nesta batalha eterna. Jogue como Simon Belmont, armado com o lendário chicote, Vampire Killer, para vencer o Drácula e seus malvados ajudantes. Simon possui outras armas à sua disposição, como machados, água benta, cruzes, facas e até mesmo um cronômetro mágico que pode parar o tempo por alguns instantes. Viaje por 11 fases, começando pelo campo até chegar ao castelo do Drácula, e vença armadilhas perigosas e monstros hediondos. Somente o poder do Belmont pode combater o mal iminente.

ES.name: Super Castlevania IV
ES.description: Un siglo de tranquilidad ha llegado a su fin en Transilvania. El Conde Drácula ha vuelto, ¡y esta vez tiene una lápida con tu nombre, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV es uno de los mayores éxitos de Castlevania, la popular saga de Konami, que traslada a Super NES™ la mejor acción en juegos de plataformas. Explora el castillo y sus terroríficos escenarios, usa tu látigo a modo de arpeo para sortear obstáculos y equípate con armas como hachas, agua bendita y muchas más, ¡y envía a los esbirros de Drácula de vuelta a sus tumbas! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

GB.name: Super Castlevania IV
GB.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is a highlight of Konami’s popular Castlevania series, bringing some of the finest platform exploration and action to Super NES™. Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Super Castlevania IV
IT.description: Dopo un secolo di tranquillità, la Transilvania è precipitata di nuovo nel terrore: il conte Dracula è tornato e ha già pronta una lapide che reca inciso il tuo nome, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV è una vera gemma della popolare serie Castlevania targata Konami, e offre un'esperienza di azione ed esplorazione platform tra le migliori godibili su Super Nintendo™. Esplora il castello e le sue lugubri segrete, usa la frusta per aggrapparti ed evitare insidiose trappole e armati di scuri, acqua santa e tante altre risorse per rispedire i seguaci di Dracula nelle loro tombe! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

LV.name: Super Castlevania IV
LV.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is a highlight of Konami’s popular Castlevania series, bringing some of the finest platform exploration and action to Super NES™. Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Super Castlevania IV
MX.description: En el tranquilo país de Transilvania, hay una leyenda de un castillo del mal y su dueño, Drácula, príncipe de la oscuridad. Cada cien años, los poderes del bien se debilitan misteriosamente y el mal intenta resucitar a Drácula. Depende del clan Belmont el dirigir la lucha eterna contra el vampiro. Los jugadores tomarán el rol de Simon Belmont quien armado con el legendario látigo Vampire Killer tratará de derrotar a Drácula y a sus malvados secuaces. Afortunadamente Simon tiene a su disposición varias armas adicionales incluyendo hachas, agua bendita, cruces, cuchillos e incluso un cronómetro mágico que puede detener el paso del tiempo por momentos. Para llegar al castillo de Drácula, Simon deberá viajar a través de 11 escenarios empezando por el campo y superar peligrosas trampas y a monstruos horrorosos. Solo el poder de los Belmont puede evitar la oscuridad inminente.

NO.name: Super Castlevania IV
NO.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is a highlight of Konami’s popular Castlevania series, bringing some of the finest platform exploration and action to Super NES™. Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Super Castlevania IV
NL.description: In Transsylvanië wordt een eeuw van betrekkelijke rust onverwacht en wreed verstoord. Graaf Dracula is terug, en dit keer heeft hij ook een zerk vrijgehouden voor jou, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is een hoogtepunt in Konami’s populaire Castlevania-reeks. Geniet van een van de beste platformspellen die ooit werden uitgebracht voor de Super NES™. Ga op avontuur in het lugubere kasteel, gebruik je zweep om langs vallen te slingeren en bewapen jezelf met bijlen, wijwater en meer om Dracula’s volgelingen terug naar hun laatste rustplaats te sturen! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

RO.name: Super Castlevania IV
RO.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: Super Castlevania IV
RU.description: Столетие покоя в Трансильвании подошло к концу. В страну возвращается Count Dracula (граф Дракула), и в его руках — надгробный камень, на котором высечено твое имя, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV — одна из лучших игр популярной серии Castlevania от компании Konami. В этом платформере для Super NES™ вас ожидает захватывающее исследование игрового мира и динамичные бои. Изучите мрачный графский замок и его окрестности, перелетайте через ловушки, цепляясь кнутом за выступы. В вашем арсенале будут топоры, святая вода и многое другое. Отправьте прислужников Dracula обратно в могилы! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

MT.name: Super Castlevania IV
MT.description: A century of Transylvanian tranquillity has ended. Count Dracula has returned, and this time he has a tombstone with your name on it, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV is a highlight of Konami’s popular Castlevania series, bringing some of the finest platform exploration and action to Super NES™. Explore the castle and its gruesome grounds, using your whip like a grappling hook to swing past traps; and arm yourself with weapons like axes, holy water and more, to send Dracula’s minions back to the grave! FR.name: Super Castlevania IV
FR.description: Après un siècle de paix, l'ombre du mal s'abat à nouveau sur la Transylvanie. Le conte Dracula est de retour et cette fois, il a gravé votre nom sur une pierre tombale, Simon Belmont ! Super Castlevania IV est l'un des meilleurs épisodes de la saga Castlevania. Ce titre a marqué l'histoire de la Super Nintendo™ en combinant de superbes séquences d'action et d'exploration. Traversez le sinistre château et servez-vous de votre fouet pour échapper aux pièges. Vous pourrez vous équiper de différentes armes telles que des haches, de l'eau bénite et bien plus encore pour vous débarrasser des sbires de Dracula ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

PT.name: Super Castlevania IV
PT.description: Um século de tranquilidade chegou ao fim na Transilvânia. Count Dracula está de volta e, desta vez, tem consigo uma lápide com o teu nome, Simon Belmont! Super Castlevania IV é um dos maiores sucessos da popular série Castlevania da Konami, trazendo a melhor ação e exploração de plataformas para a Super NES™. Explora o castelo e os seus recintos arrepiantes, utilizando o teu chicote como um gancho para te segurares e escapares a armadilhas, e protege-te com armas como machados, água benta e muito mais, para enviares os subordinados de Dracula de volta para o túmulo! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

US.name: Super Castlevania IV
US.description: In the peaceful country of Transylvania, there is a legend of an evil castle and its master, the Prince of Darkness, Dracula. Once every hundred years, the powers of good mysteriously weaken, and evil attempts to resurrect Dracula. It's up to the Belmont clan to take up the eternal fight against the vampire. Players take on the role of Simon Belmont, armed with the legendary whip, Vampire Killer, to defeat Dracula and his evil minions. Luckily, Simon has many additional weapons at his disposal, including axes, holy water, crosses, knives and even a magical stopwatch that can stop the flow of time for a spell. Simon must travel through 11 stages, beginning in the countryside, to reach Dracula's Castle, all the while overcoming perilous traps and hideous monsters. Only the power of the Belmonts can quell the looming darkness.
